sect1.title: Installation with setup.rb
sect1.para: Please download s2container-version.tgz and do "ruby setup.rb".
sect1.programlisting: % tar zxvf s2container-version.tgz % cd s2container-version % ruby setup.rb %
sect1.para: S2Container.Ruby will be available by requiring "s2container.rb".
